title: Mock-elimination & baselines
body:
This PR establishes CPU baseline receipts and eliminates mocked inference from the codebase.

## Changes

- Generate CPU baseline receipt with I2_S quantization
- Implement receipt verification in Model Gates workflow
- Remove mocked inference paths
- Add baseline documentation in docs/baselines/

## Testing

- [x] CPU baseline generated (docs/baselines/20251009-cpu.json)
- [x] Receipt verification passes
- [x] Model Gates (CPU) workflow operational
- [x] All tests pass with --no-default-features --features cpu

## Evidence

Receipt: docs/baselines/20251009-cpu.json
Performance: 15.3 tok/s (I2_S quantization, 2B model)
Kernels: i2s_cpu_quantized_matmul, tl1_lut_dequant_forward, etc.

milestone.title: v0.1.0-mvp
milestone.description: MVP release with CPU baseline and honest compute
